custom-sql.sql: SELECT oes_teacheruserlink.teachernumber, oes_teacheruserlink.userid FROM oes_teacheruserlink, user_ WHERE oes_teacheruserlink.userid = user_.userid AND POSITION( ? IN LOWER( COALESCE(user_.firstname, '') || COALESCE(user_.lastname, '') || COALESCE(user_.emailaddress, '') || oes_teacheruserlink.teachernumber ) ) > 0
